column5: Nestled in the historical district of Dallas our place is one you will belong in. It's warm ambiance will make you feel right at home. Our apartment is located right next to a kid friendly park as well as a quaint little cafe for those early mornings or late lunches. It is also less then 3 miles from some of the local favorite bars and restaurants. Don't have the dates you need? Check out: https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/17142583
